title: Porno
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: But I begin my scouting mission closer to home. There's been a few messages left at the pub from a certain Paul Keramalandous of the Links Agency, a yuppie advertising firm down in Queen Charlotte Street who are said to epitomise the 'new Leith'. The messages state that Keramalandous is interested in the Leith Business Against Drugs Forum.
